comments.body: Here in 2.4 we pass an `endpointRef` as parameter instead of a `name` in 3.x

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +155,159 @@    val endpointRef = mock(classOf[NettyRpcEndpointRef])
    val dispatcher = mock(classOf[Dispatcher])
    val inbox = new Inbox(endpointRef, endpoint)
    inbox.post(OneWayMessage(null, "hi"))
    intercept[OutOfMemoryError] {
